page.description: Alpha Anywhere does not really have the concept of a NULL value for a table field value. If you want to test if the field is empty, then you use these expressions:

section.content:
Data TypeCodeComment
CharacterC*[xb:= ""]*
DateD*[xb:= ctod("")]*
NumericNYou cannot distinguish between records that have no value, and those that have a 0 in them. The .DBF table format, which Alpha Five uses, has no concept of a NULL numeric value.
*[xb:= 0]*
LogicalLYou cannot distinguish between records that have no value, and those that have a .f. value.
*[xb:= .f.]*
TimeT*[xb:= 00/00/0000 12:00:00 00 am]*
Short TimeY*[xb:= 12:00:00 00 am]*
